answerText: The Broken Jug [10] This man wrote The Broken Jug after failing to complete Robert Guiscard. This German playwright of Penthesilea also wrote Michael Kohlhaas and stories such as "The Marquise of O."
heading: ACF Regionals  |2012 | Chicago A  | 6 | Literature | European | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: Heinrich Zschokke stated this work was inspired by a French copper engraving called La Cruche Cassee, and prior to the main action a clubfooted judge is rapped with a doorlatch. For 10 points each: [10] Name this comedy that opens when the judge Adam tells Licht he sprained his leg while saying his morning hymns, though in fact he jumped out a window during a failed attempt to rape Eve.
